KW Commercial's commitment to excellence has been proven time and time again by the results that our agents produce for their clients. When you engage KW Commercial, you aren't simply hiring a broker; you are hiring an entire company and a network of dedicated commercial real estate professionals across North America.    When Keller Williams Realty was founded in 1983, Gary Keller and Joe Williams envisioned a company that would dominate both the residential and commercial real estate markets.As a company with an International reach, serving both the U.S. and Canada, KW Commercial is the fulfillment of that vision.KW Commercial agents and brokers hold each other to the highest standard of business. Their excellence has been proven time and time again by the results that our agents produce for their clients.When you work with a KW Commercial broker, you aren’t working with one person; you’re working with an entire network of dedicated professionals across North America. Mission:	To build commercial careers worth having, businesses worth owning and lives worth living.Vision:	To become the commercial real estate company of choice for a new generation of sales associates and real estate owners.Values:	God, Family, and then BusinessAREAS OF SPECIALTY· Office/Industrial		· Tenant Representation			· Hospitality/Specialty· Industrial			        · Multifamily				               · Distressed Assets· Retail				        · Land/Development			       · International Investors

summary: Raised in New York and a graduate of Cornell University, Hani Aldulaimi has been living and focusing on real estate and construction in Arizona for over fifteen years.  While working with Chevron Corporation, Hani was involved in new business acquisitions, asset management and real estate development of service stations and retail centers in the Phoenix, Tucson, Las Vegas and Southern California markets.  Hani launched his real estate company by joining forces with Keller Williams Realty East Valley in 2002 and accepting the role of Managing Broker for the Commercial Division in 2007 as well as KW Commercial Director in 2008.  He has represented tenants and landlords, as well as buyers and sellers, in locating and negotiating office, retail, industrial and land leases/sales.  Hani also has expertise in the areas of multi-family investments, gas station/c-store/car wash sales, 1031 exchanges and investor relations.  He is a KWEV Agent Leadership Council member, an active investor and developer, and founder of the Commercial Petroleum Group.  Hani’s vision is to continue to expand the KW Commercial division in KWEV while providing the highest level of quality service and integrity.  He is also the owner of Infinity Property Services, LLC, a licensed residential and commercial general contracting company with four main divisions:  Residential Remodeling, Repair & Maintenance, Restoration and Commercial Tenant Improvements.Hani has been married to his wife Jessica since 2006 and has two kids, a son Alex and a daughter Sofia.  He is passionate about nature and loves to travel, read and photograph wildlife.  Hani enjoys sports, hiking, cooking and spending time with his family.
name: Hani Aldulaimi
title: Principal - Real Estate and Construction
